statements: DELETE FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_name = 'backup' AND retention_period = '30 days';
DELETE FROM retention_policies WHERE created_datetime < (NOW() - interval '30 days');
DELETE FROM DataDeletionLog WHERE reason = 'expired' AND policy_id = 2;
DELETE FROM DataDeletionLog WHERE log_id = 100 AND reason = 'Invalid Record';
DELETE FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE retention_period < 365 AND legal_requirement = 'GDPR Compliance';
DELETE FROM data_item WHERE item_id = 100 AND date_created < '2022-01-01';
